title: ‘TDR’ or ‘Additional FSI on payment of premium’ as per Regulation No 30 (1) (A) [except Fungible Compensatory area as per Regulation No
clause_text: ‘TDR’ or ‘Additional FSI on payment of premium’ as per Regulation No 30 (1) (A) [except Fungible Compensatory area as per Regulation No. 31(3)], shall not be permissible on Owner’s share of land. (f)The land handed over to MCGM for OA as stated above shall not be allowed to be developed under
